FAQ: What makes saffron such a special ingredient in perfumery?

Saffron is one of the most precious and expensive spices in the world, harvested from the Crocus sativus flower. In perfumery, it adds a distinctive warm, honeyed, and slightly metallic character that creates depth and intrigue. The saffron note in Brandy Saffron Noir is meticulously balanced with complementary ingredients to highlight its luxurious qualities while ensuring a harmonious overall composition.
